answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some sample documents that may be helpful.
This is the main webpage of the North Carolina Office of Internal Audit.
http://www.osbm.state.nc.us/ncosbm/management/internal_audits.shtm
They have a link to their charter which you can view below.
http://www.osbm.state.nc.us/files/pdf_files/OIA_Audit_Charter.pdf
This is a sample resolution to form an Internal Audit Committee from Adams County, CO.
http://www.co.adams.co.us/DocumentView.aspx?DID=657
Here is a similar resolution from the Port Authority of Alleghany County, PA.
http://www.portauthority.org/paac/portals/0/Board/InternalAuditWorkPlan.pdf
You can also view the Internal Audit Commission from Ashland, OR. 
http://www.ashland.or.us/CCBIndex.asp?CCBID=187
Below is the link to the City of Bowling Green, KY Internal Audit Committee homepage.
http://www.bgky.org/citymanager/auditorcomm.php
I have also included the link to the Association of Local Government Auditors which may have some helpful information as well.
http://www.governmentauditors.org/index.php
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Anita Lewis
text: Seeking language for a resolution establishing an internal audit committee for a third class county.  The committee consists of the manager, auditor, treasurer and two council members.
title: Internal Audit Committee
